title: The role of a cricket agent explainedâ€¦ Simon Auteri reveals how the game is changing for its star players
description: Nasser and Athers are joined by a cricket agent this week to find out more about how the sport is changing for its star players.Simon Auteri, who works for TGI Sports, explains what his job entails and how he represents his players.They discuss how players are trying to take advantage of appearing in franchise tournaments around the world and how the sport is changing as a result.
author: Sky Sports

show more

Nasser and Athers are joined by a cricket agent this week to find out more about how the sport is changing for its star players.

Simon Auteri, who works for TGI Sports, explains what his job entails and how he represents his players.

They discuss how players are trying to take advantage of appearing in franchise tournaments around the world and how the sport is changing as a result.

show less
